install.name: eshop_auspostpac
install.title: AusPost - Postage Assesment Calculator
install.author: Giang Dinh Truong
install.description: This is Australia Post Shipping method for Eshop

field.name: min_total
field.label: Min Total
field.description: If the total amount reach Min Total, then the AusPost - Postage Assesment Calculator shipping will be disable and the Free Shipping will be available. Leave 0 if you do not want to use it.

field.name: min_quantity
field.label: Min Quantity
field.description: If the total quantity reach Min Quantity, then the AusPost - Postage Assesment Calculator shipping will be disable and the Free Shipping will be available. Leave 0 if you do not want to use it.

field.name: auspost_pac_origin_postcode
field.label: Origin Postcode (*)
field.description: The location you are shipping from

field.name: auspost_pac_services_domestic
field.label: Services (Domestic)
field.description: Select the AusPost (PAC) domestic services to be offered

field.name: auspost_pac_show_delivery_time
field.label: Display Delivery Time
field.description: Show/Hide the display of delivery time of services.

field.name: auspost_pac_use_http
field.label: Access AusPost Securely
field.description: Enables connecting to AusPost via HTTPS.

field.name: auspost_pac_multiple_packages
field.label: Multiple Packages
field.description: Enables splitting large order over multiple packages.

field.name: auspost_pac_handling_fee
field.label: Handling Fee
field.description: Additional handling charge. Leave 0 to disable.

field.name: show_shipping_cost_with_tax
field.label: Show Shipping Cost With Tax
field.description: If Yes, once you choose a Tax Class below, it will display shipping cost include tax.

field.name: payment_methods
field.label: Payment Methods
field.description: Choose corresponding available payment methods when AusPost Shipping method is chosen. Select all or Un-select all to choose all payment methods.
